channel.title: CVE Feed for Hewlett Packard Enterprise -- ArubaOS-Switch
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Hewlett Packard Enterprise -- ArubaOS-Switch

item.title: CVE-2023-39268|2024-09-27T19:51:59.087Z -- hewlett%20packard%20enterprise -- arubaos-switch
item.description: A memory corruption vulnerability in ArubaOS-Switch could lead to unauthenticated remote code execution by receiving specially crafted packets. Successful exploitation of this vulnerability results in the ability to execute arbitrary code as a privileged user on the underlying operating system.

item.title: CVE-2023-39266|2024-09-27T21:56:37.037Z -- hewlett%20packard%20enterprise -- arubaos-switch
item.description: A vulnerability in the ArubaOS-Switch web management interface could allow an unauthenticated remote attacker to conduct a stored cross-site scripting (XSS) attack against a user of the interface provided certain configuration options are present. A successful exploit could allow an attacker to execute arbitrary script code in a victim's browser in the context of the affected interface.

item.title: CVE-2023-39267|2024-09-27T19:54:56.961Z -- hewlett%20packard%20enterprise -- arubaos-switch
item.description: An authenticated remote code execution vulnerability exists in the command line interface in ArubaOS-Switch. Successful exploitation results in a Denial-of-Service (DoS) condition in the switch.
